title: Confined tandem catalytic quasi-solid sulfur reversible conversion for all-solid-state Na–S batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,5273-5282
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01750A, Paper
Weiwei Zhang, Bin Song, Mingli Wang, Tingting Miao, Xiang-Long Huang, Erhuan Zhang, Xiaowen Zhan, Yue Yang, Hong Zhang, Ke Lu
The designed york–shell structured MnHCF/PPy@MnO2 coaxial nanotubes cooperatively catalyze the conversion of interchannel encapsulated active species within the confined environment, regulating the reversible quasi-solid sulfur conversion.
